comment.raw:
/**
 * This component provides an API for rendering the Cloudinary Upload Widget. It won't render anything on it's own so must have a button nested which calls `open()`.
 *
 * @example
 *
 * Upload Widget
 * ```svelte
 * <script>
 * 	import { CldUploadWidget } from 'svelte-cloudinary';
 * </script>
 *
 * <CldUploadWidget uploadPreset="<your upload preset>" let:open>
 * 	<button on:click={open}>
 * 		Open the widget
 * 	</button>
 * </CldUploadWidget>
 * ```
 *
 * @see
 *
 * https://svelte.cloudinary.dev/components/upload-widget
 */
comment.summary:
This component provides an API for rendering the Cloudinary Upload Widget.
It won't render anything on it's own so must have a button nested
which calls `open()`.

examples.name: Upload Widget
examples.content:
```svelte
<script>
	import { CldUploadWidget } from 'svelte-cloudinary';
</script>

<CldUploadWidget uploadPreset="<your upload preset>" let:open>
	<button on:click={open}>
		Open the widget
	</button>
</CldUploadWidget>
```

comment.raw:
/**
 * Overrides for the global Cloudinary config.
 *
 * @see
 *
 * https://svelte.cloudinary.dev/config
 */
comment.summary: Overrides for the global Cloudinary config.

comment.raw:
/**
 * Upload Presets are configured on Cloudinary and provide a way to centrally define a set of upload options.
 *
 * @see
 *
 * https://cloudinary.com/documentation/upload_presets
 */
comment.summary: Upload Presets are configured on Cloudinary and provide a way to centrally define a set of upload options.
Signing requests is the recommended way to upload images as it provides enhanced security for your uploads.
Options to customise and configure the upload widget.
Fires when an error occurs uploading.
Fires when the widget is opened.

/**

 * @see

 * https://cloudinary.com/documentation/upload_widget_reference#abort
 */

 * https://cloudinary.com/documentation/upload_widget_reference#batch_cancelled

comment.raw:
/**

 * @see

 * https://cloudinary.com/documentation/upload_widget_reference#queues_start

comment.raw:
/**
 * Fires when the user retried after uploads failed.
 *
 * @see
 *
 * https://cloudinary.com/documentation/upload_widget_reference#retry

comment.summary: Fires when the user retried after uploads failed.

comment.raw:
/**
 * Fires when the user clicks the "Show Completed" button. Requires the showCompletedButton option be set to true.
 *
 * @see
 *
 * https://cloudinary.com/documentation/upload_widget_reference#show_completed
 */
comment.summary:
Fires when the user clicks the "Show Completed" button.
Requires the showCompletedButton option be set to true.
